text: Jehoiada ga haga menegenege aga digau hai mee dabu mo digau Levi e madamada humalia di moomee di Hale Daumaha. Digaula belee hai nadau waawa hegau ala ne hagaingoo ang gi ginaadou mai baahi King David, gei e dudu nia tigidaumaha e wanga gi Dimaadua gii hai be Nnaganoho a Moses. Digaula e madamada humalia labelaa nia daahili mono budu nia laangi hagalabagau.
